home.title: Frontend Developer
home.subtitle: I am a frontend developer dedicated to crafting responsive, user-friendly web experiences with creativity and precision.

about.intro-text-two: a skilled frontend developer from Azerbaijan. I focus on developing user-friendly, efficient, and maintainable web applications using modern technologies.
about.intro-text-second: My programming journey began out of curiosity and evolved into a strong professional interest. I enjoy solving real-world problems, continuously learning new technologies, and working on structured UI/UX development.
